pinyin: shen2 sheng4 bu4 ke3 qin1 fan4
Shen2 sheng4 Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2

sentences.english: It's the plural for heaven, so the heavens or the heavenly places is this Greek word.
sentences.chinese: 這裏用的是複數，天國和神聖之地是同一個希臘詞。

sentences.english: The wedding kiss is the sign of the holy pledge between the bride and the groom.
sentences.chinese: 婚禮上的親吻標誌着新郎新娘間的神聖誓約。

sentences.english: The ego has a way of turning the loftiest activities into trash if it is allowed free range.
sentences.chinese: 如果可能，自我可以把最神聖的東西變成垃圾。

sentences.english: In fact, nothing teaches you sanctification like the life of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，沒有什麼比持續一生的婚姻更神聖的。

sentences.english: His name was Charlemagne-Charles Magnus, the Great-emperor of the Romans.
sentences.chinese: 他就是神聖羅馬帝國皇帝查理曼大帝。

sentences.english: You are all divine sparks and divine creators.
sentences.chinese: 你全是神性之光和神聖創造者。

sentences.english: If such be Nature's holy plan.
sentences.chinese: 設若這就是大自然的神聖的旨意。

sentences.english: every part of this earth is sacred to my people.every
sentences.chinese: 對我的同胞來說，地球上的每一寸土地都是神聖的。

sentences.english: There are some touching illusions which are, perhaps, sublime realities.
sentences.chinese: 有些動人的幻想也許真是最神聖的現實。

sentences.english: Its only the scared things that are worth touching.
sentences.chinese: 只有神聖的東西才值得被褻玩。

sentences.english: Samson started out with all the assets of a holy, consecrated life.
sentences.chinese: 參孫開始於享受一切神聖的資源的聖潔的人生。

sentences.english: Master Demonologist (Felhunter) will now also reduce damage taken by Holy.
sentences.chinese: 惡魔學識大師現在也能減免神聖傷害。

sentences.english: Nature to a saint is sacramental.
sentences.chinese: 自然對一個聖徒來說是神聖的。

sentences.english: I disrespected the most holy laws .
sentences.chinese: 我褻瀆了最神聖的法律。

sentences.english: Lusu's fire pit is the center of family activities. It is also a sacred place.
sentences.chinese: 傈僳族的火塘是家庭活動的中心，也是神聖的場所。

sentences.english: But if they're holy, they must be pure.
sentences.chinese: 蛋如果它是神聖的，它必然是純潔的。

definition: huge/great/grand/worthy of the greatest admiration/important (contribution etc)
